Name: Whiskey Daisy No.2
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with a splash of soda.
Review: Light, fresh and fruity. Perfect for a summer's afternoon.
History: Recipe adapted from Harry Johnson's 1888 Harry Johnson's New & Improved Bartender's Manual which also has an illustration of this cocktail (Plate No. 10) served in a stemmed wine glass filled with crushed ice.
Nutrition: One serving of Whiskey Daisy No.2 contains 189 calories
